parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: Night Light
parameter.description:
Defines the behavior of the blue LED.

Overview

Default is Night Light mode where LED is on when switch is off.

options.option: LED on when switch is OFF
LED on when switch is ON

parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: Invert Switch
parameter.description:
Change the top of the switch to OFF and the bottom of the switch to ON.

Overview

Note: If you invert the switches and also install the product upside down, remember the load will now be controlled by the right, not the left switch.

parameter.name: config_5_1
parameter.label: 5: Ignore Start-Level (Receiving)
parameter.description: This dimmer will start dimming from its current level.

parameter.name: config_7_1
parameter.label: 7: On/Off Command Dim Step
parameter.description: Indicates how many levels the dimmer will change for each dimming step.

parameter.name: config_8_1
parameter.label: 8: On/Off Command Dim Rate
parameter.description:
Sets the rate at which the dimmer changes the light level.

Overview

This value indicates in 10 millisecond resolution, how often the dim level will change. For example, if you set this parameter to 1, then every 10ms the dim level will change. If you set it to 255, then every 2.55 seconds

parameter.name: config_9_1
parameter.label: 9: Local Control Dim Step
parameter.description: Indicates how many levels the dimmer will change for each dimming step.

parameter.name: config_10_1
parameter.label: 10: Local Control Dim Rate
parameter.description:
Sets the dim rate

Overview

This value indicates in 10 millisecond resolution, how often the dim level will change. For example, if you set this parameter to 1, then every 10ms the dim level will change. If you set it to 255, then every 2.55 seconds the dimmer will change.

parameter.name: config_11_1
parameter.label: 11: ALL ON/ALL OFF Dim Step
parameter.description: Indicates how many levels the dimmer will change for each dimming step.

parameter.name: config_12_1
parameter.label: 12: ALL ON/ALL OFF Dim Rate
parameter.description:
Sets the dim rate for the all on/off command

Overview

This value indicates in 10 millisecond resolution, how often the dim level will change. For example, if you set this parameter to 1, then every 10ms the dim level will change. If you set it to 255, then every 2.55 seconds the dimmer will change.
